name: Keep your shoes clean
description: I'm so glad you visit this page and play this stupid game! This is my first game for the "I can't draw and want to make a game" game jam, the art quality is poor, the level need to be designed better, and so many places can be improved. I didn't pay enough time on it, and I think I will make it better in the future. If you have any thought about this game and want to tell me, please email at chris_b@live.cn.
